Treant.flavor: "No matter what anyone tells you, he hates being called "Woody"."

spell.spellDesc: Gain [0+Magic] Attack and Armor, and remove all Brown Gems to Boost the effect.

Treant.index: |Treant|Forest of Thorns|Green|Blue|Fey|Ultra Rare|12|Barkskin|Gain [0+Magic] Attack and Armor, and remove all Brown Gems to Boost the effect.|

Tyri.name: Tyri
Tyri.flavor: "Diamonds may be a girl's best friend, but emeralds and rubies will do in a pinch."

spell.spellDesc: Remove all Gems of a chosen color. Gain [4+Magic] Gold, Boosted by the gems removed.

Tyri.index: |Tyri|Zhul'Kari|Green|Purple|Elf|Epic|8|Treasure Hunt|Remove all Gems of a chosen color. Gain [4+Magic] Gold, Boosted by the gems removed.|

Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.flavor: "She's a one-way ticket to the biggest party ever!"

spell.spellDesc: Transform a selected Mana color to Blue. Gain [1+Magic] Soul(s).

Valkyrie.index: |Valkyrie|Stormheim|Yellow|Red|Divine|Rare|10|Valhalla|Transform a selected Mana color to Blue. Gain [1+Magic] Soul(s).|

spell.spellDesc: Deal [1+Magic] True Damage to an enemy, and remove all Red Gems to boost the effect. Gain 4 Life.

Vampire Lord.index: |Vampire Lord|Ghulvania|Red|Yellow|Undead|Rare|13|Lifeblood|Deal [1+Magic] True Damage to an enemy, and remove all Red Gems to boost the effect. Gain 4 Life.|

Venoxia.name: Venoxia
Venoxia.flavor: "Affectionately known to his friends as Ol' Swamp-ass."

spell.spellDesc: Create 9 Green and 9 Blue Gems, then deal 2 True Damage to all enemies. Gain [0+Magic] Attack.

Venoxia.index: |Venoxia|Mist of Scales|Green|Purple|Dragon|Legendary|16|Noxious Gas|Create 9 Green and 9 Blue Gems, then deal 2 True Damage to all enemies. Gain [0+Magic] Attack.|

Warhound.name: Warhound
Warhound.flavor: "He ain't nothin' but a hound dog."

spell.spellDesc: Reduce the first enemy's Attack by [0+Magic].

Warlock.name: Warlock
Warlock.flavor: "If you're wise, powerful and enjoy inflicting pain on the helpless, you're either a Dentist, or a Warlock."

spell.spellDesc: Deal [0+Magic] damage to an enemy, and remove all Purple Gems to Boost damage.

Warlock.index: |Warlock|Karakoth|Blue|Brown|Human|Rare|8|Dark Channel|Deal [0+Magic] damage to an enemy, and remove all Purple Gems to Boost damage.|

Watcher.name: Watcher

Webspinner.name: Webspinner
Webspinner.flavor: "Looks like she came straight out of Module Q1. If you get that reference, you're HARDCORE."

spell.spellDesc: Deal [0+Magic] Damage to all enemies and Poison them. Create 9 Green Gems.

Wight.name: Wight
Wight.flavor: "Don't ask him his favorite color. He's heard that joke before."

spell.spellDesc: Steal [1+Magic] Life from an enemy. Create 5 Purple Gems.

Wolf Knight.flavor: "They prefer to hunt in the dark. It's easy when you have knight-vision."

Zombie.name: Zombie
